I tried to open the file using a command, but it returned an error saying the shell command is not allowed. An AI response provided a command to read the file, which returned information on the trail including the distance, duration, and elevation gain. I then executed a Python code to calculate the average speed required to complete the trail in the given duration, which returned a result of 2.42 miles per hour.

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: providing information on running routes in the Brno Reservoir area in Czechia. The area offers approximately 8 km of decent running with rolling hills, but there is no loop trail around the entire reservoir. The top end of the reservoir around U Sirky beach is a good area to start, and there is bus access available. The text does not provide information on the distance and elevation gain of the Brno Reservoir Trail.
